content.text: Unless national or local regulations specify other requirements, the segregation and protective measures of  Table 10 should be observed.

tables.caption: Table 10 Minimum clearances and protective measures at crossings between information  technology cables and various underground services
tables.html:
Other servicesClearances at
crossing		Protection measures to be applied to the
information technology cabling
Inflammable gas or liquid ducts (operating
pressure ≤ 500 kPa)		0,5 mConduit or duct extending for at least 1,0 m
each side of the crossing.
Inflammable gas or liquid ducts (operating
pressure > 500 kPa)		1,5 mConduit or duct extending for at least 1,0 m
each side of the crossing.
Water pipes sewers and ducts0,3 mConduit or duct extending for at least 0,5 m
each side of the crossing.
District heating pipes1,0 mConduit or duct extending for at least 0,5 m
each side of the crossing.

requirements.text: Unless national or local regulations specify other requirements, the segregation and protective measures of  Table 10 should be observed.
